Entries.DialogueText: 呃……嗨。我是克林特。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 呃......嗨。我是克林特。

Entries.DialogueText: 我是这个小镇的铁匠。要是想升级农具的话，就来找我吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我是这个小镇的铁匠。要是想升级农具的话,就来找我吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 一般不会有人送我生日礼物。{Farmer_Name}，我很感动，谢谢你。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 一般不会有人送我生日礼物。,我很感动,谢谢你。

Entries.DialogueText: 是给我的生日礼物吗？这个，呃……很耐人寻味，不过你能记得，我还是很感激。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 是给我的生日礼物吗?这个,呃......很耐人寻味,不过你能记得,我还是很感激。

Entries.DialogueText: 这个是……要送给我的？实在是太贵重了……谢谢你。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这个是......要送给我的?实在是太贵重了......谢谢你。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗯，很有意思……这书在星露谷可不容易弄到。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗯,很有意思......这书在星露谷可不容易弄到。

Entries.DialogueText: 里面好像有很多实用的建议，谢谢你，{Farmer_Name}。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 里面好像有很多实用的建议,谢谢你,。

Entries.DialogueText: 啊，看你镐头上的划痕，想必你已经到过矿井深层了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 啊,看你镐头上的划痕,想必你已经到过矿井深层了。

Entries.DialogueText: 如果石头越来越难敲碎，建议你升级一下镐头，我可以帮你。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果石头越来越难敲碎,建议你升级一下镐头,我可以帮你。

Entries.DialogueText: 这种情况才是真正考验一个人有没有勇气。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这种情况才是真正考验一个人有没有勇气。

Entries.DialogueText: 我会保护艾……那什么，我会保护大家不要淋到有毒的雨水！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我会保护艾......那什么,我会保护大家不要淋到有毒的雨水!

Entries.DialogueText: 雷声大雨点小啊，我还以为总算能当一回英雄了。唉……继续干活吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 雷声大雨点小啊,我还以为总算能当一回英雄了。唉......继续干活吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 有时候我真希望来一场货真价实的天灾，而不是这个破绿雨——我知道这想法很糟糕。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有时候我真希望来一场货真价实的天灾,而不是这个破绿雨——我知道这想法很糟糕。

Entries.DialogueText: 得是那种，惊天动地级别的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 得是那种,惊天动地级别的。

Entries.DialogueText: 我不是想要有人受伤……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我不是想要有人受伤......

Entries.DialogueText: 我只是想要有活着的感觉……有人生的目标……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我只是想要有活着的感觉......有人生的目标......

Entries.DialogueText: 有意思，你的镐头上有铱矿石的碎屑……你是不是去了沙漠的洞穴？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有意思,你的镐头上有铱矿石的碎屑......你是不是去了沙漠的洞穴?

Entries.DialogueText: 我一直想要用铱来熔炼，可惜不容易弄到。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我一直想要用铱来熔炼,可惜不容易弄到。

Entries.DialogueText: 艾米丽有提到我们前几天的约会吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 艾米丽有提到我们前几天的约会吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 等等，还是别说了……我还是不要知道了，这样还能挽回一点尊严。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 等等,还是别说了......我还是不要知道了,这样还能挽回一点尊严。

Entries.DialogueText: 呃……我听说你跟艾米丽在一起了，恭喜你。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 呃......我听说你跟艾米丽在一起了,恭喜你。

Entries.DialogueText: 克林特眼睛往下看，不肯跟你说话。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 克林特眼睛往下看,不肯跟你说话。

Entries.DialogueText: 最近我莫名感觉自己有点希望。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 最近我莫名感觉自己有点希望。

Entries.DialogueText: 我要穿上我的特制红色短裤，应该非常吸引眼球。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我要穿上我的特制红色短裤,应该非常吸引眼球。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗯，结果跟我想的不太一样……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗯,结果跟我想的不太一样......

Entries.DialogueText: 哎呀……我忘了剪脚趾甲了。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎呀......我忘了剪脚趾甲了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我以为跟熔炉打交道会让我适应高温，但现在我身上到处都在流汗。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我以为跟熔炉打交道会让我适应高温,但现在我身上到处都在流汗。

Entries.DialogueText: 我希望没人注意到……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我希望没人注意到......

Entries.DialogueText: 克林特的身体正在闪闪发亮……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 克林特的身体正在闪闪发亮......

Entries.DialogueText: 嗷……我感觉我的身体都要被烤酥了。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗷......我感觉我的身体都要被烤酥了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我饿了…… {Portrait:Sad}
唉……大家都来沙滩上了，但我还是感觉很孤独…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唉......大家都来沙滩上了,但我还是感觉很孤独......

Entries.DialogueText: 唔……那块石头很有意思，跟我以前见到过的完全不一样。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唔......那块石头很有意思,跟我以前见到过的完全不一样。

Entries.DialogueText: 我不知道该怎么处理，毕竟我做的是平凡生意，不懂这些有魔法的……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我不知道该怎么处理,毕竟我做的是平凡生意,不懂这些有魔法的......

Entries.DialogueText: 不知怎的，旧城的矿车系统又开始运作了。对于往返矿山来说，这十分便利。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不知怎的,旧城的矿车系统又开始运作了。对于往返矿山来说,这十分便利。

Entries.DialogueText: 但是不是很舒服……如果它可以突然启用，它也会突然关闭……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 但是不是很舒服......如果它可以突然启用,它也会突然关闭......

Entries.DialogueText: 没错。我是个铁匠。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 没错。我是个铁匠。

Entries.DialogueText: 我父亲以前也是一名铁匠。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我父亲以前也是一名铁匠。

Entries.DialogueText: 你一定猜不到我的曾祖父以前是一名……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你一定猜不到我的曾祖父以前是一名......

Entries.DialogueText: 铁匠。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 铁匠。

Entries.DialogueText: 一个糊涂的小丑
Entries.DisplayPattern: 一个糊涂的小丑

Entries.DialogueText: 一个尖酸刻薄的混蛋。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 一个尖酸刻薄的混蛋。

Entries.DialogueText: 没错。我的曾祖父也是名铁匠。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 没错。我的曾祖父也是名铁匠。

Entries.DialogueText: 你怎么知道的？ {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你怎么知道的?

Entries.DialogueText: 哈哈哈。猜得好。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哈哈哈。猜得好。

Entries.DialogueText: 喔。这样可很无礼哦。我不过是想开个玩笑罢了，你却把这件事搞严重了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 喔。这样可很无礼哦。我不过是想开个玩笑罢了,你却把这件事搞严重了。

Entries.DialogueText: 真羡慕你是个农民啊，{Farmer_Name}。在户外工作可比整天在热腾腾的大火炉旁边好多了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 真羡慕你是个农民啊,。在户外工作可比整天在热腾腾的大火炉旁边好多了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我当这个铁匠都是因为我爸爸非要让我当啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我当这个铁匠都是因为我爸爸非要让我当啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 如果你想找我升级工具的话，就得给我找来合适的矿石。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果你想找我升级工具的话,就得给我找来合适的矿石。

Entries.DialogueText: 当然了，也得付我些钱啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 当然了,也得付我些钱啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿。要点什么？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿。要点什么?

Entries.DialogueText: 啊，你好，{Farmer_Name}。真抱歉，我身上有点脏。我一整个早晨都在这个火炉边上工作。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 啊,你好,。真抱歉,我身上有点脏。我一整个早晨都在这个火炉边上工作。

Entries.DialogueText: 话说回来，你有什么需要呢，还是只是来看看？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 话说回来,你有什么需要呢,还是只是来看看?

Entries.DialogueText: 最近生意很冷清啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 最近生意很冷清啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 你该升级下你的工具了。这样我也能挣一笔。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你该升级下你的工具了。这样我也能挣一笔。

Entries.DialogueText: 我听说艾米丽有一个朋友住在沙漠，你了解她吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我听说艾米丽有一个朋友住在沙漠,你了解她吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 不知道她是不是单身呢…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不知道她是不是单身呢......

Entries.DialogueText: 这天气对我来说倒不是什么大问题。通常来说我一整年都在店附近转悠。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这天气对我来说倒不是什么大问题。通常来说我一整年都在店附近转悠。

Entries.DialogueText: 听起来有点憋屈吧？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 听起来有点憋屈吧?

Entries.DialogueText: 我应该攒钱买台电脑……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我应该攒钱买台电脑......

Entries.DialogueText: 在“互联网”上说不定能找到女朋友…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 在“互联网”上说不定能找到女朋友......

Entries.DialogueText: 什么？你别看不起我！又不是所有人都长得帅，有魅力，善于社交，还有自己的农场的！ {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 什么?你别看不起我!又不是所有人都长得帅,有魅力,善于社交,还有自己的农场的!

Entries.DialogueText: 我这种人到底要咋办啊？哎哟…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我这种人到底要咋办啊?哎哟......

Entries.DialogueText: 有时候我还会想想我在这个小镇最终会怎么样。 {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有时候我还会想想我在这个小镇最终会怎么样。

Entries.DialogueText: 该死，我这岁数已经没法再做什么刺激的事情了。我能做的只剩下在这灼热的铁炉边上大汗淋漓地干铁匠活了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 该死,我这岁数已经没法再做什么刺激的事情了。我能做的只剩下在这灼热的铁炉边上大汗淋漓地干铁匠活了。

Entries.DialogueText: 你的工具状态怎么样？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你的工具状态怎么样?

Entries.DialogueText: 如果需要修理的话，直接来我店里，我给你终身保修！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果需要修理的话,直接来我店里,我给你终身保修!

Entries.DialogueText: 你没活干吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你没活干吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 你的那些工具现在用得怎么样？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你的那些工具现在用得怎么样?

Entries.DialogueText: 我其实对自己的工作很自豪，不过可能没人意识到，也没人在意。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我其实对自己的工作很自豪,不过可能没人意识到,也没人在意。

Entries.DialogueText: 我跟你说……我小时候的梦想不是当铁匠，可是现在我成为铁匠了，而且我想当最好的铁匠。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我跟你说......我小时候的梦想不是当铁匠,可是现在我成为铁匠了,而且我想当最好的铁匠。

Entries.DialogueText: 好吧……我记着点。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 好吧......我记着点。

Entries.DialogueText: 问题就在这儿……虽然我表现得很自然……可我从没体验过成功的感觉啊。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 问题就在这儿......虽然我表现得很自然......可我从没体验过成功的感觉啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 我不得不承认，有时候我还挺庆幸我父亲当初逼我当铁匠，现在我至少有一份生计。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我不得不承认,有时候我还挺庆幸我父亲当初逼我当铁匠,现在我至少有一份生计。

Entries.DialogueText: 假如我连可以干的活都没有，我大概只好整天无所事事，不停地感到后悔。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 假如我连可以干的活都没有,我大概只好整天无所事事,不停地感到后悔。

Entries.DialogueText: 今天是探索矿场的好日子……运气好的话说不定能够找到稀有矿石。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 今天是探索矿场的好日子......运气好的话说不定能够找到稀有矿石。

Entries.DialogueText: Uh... Hi there. Good morning.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Uh... Hi there. Good morning.

Entries.DialogueText: I noticed that you've been breaking some rocks open and finding ore. That's good!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I noticed that you've been breaking some rocks open and finding ore. That's good!

Entries.DialogueText: If you want to get the most out of the ores you find, you'll need a furnace.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you want to get the most out of the ores you find, you'll need a furnace.

Entries.DialogueText: Just so happens I had an extra set of blueprints lying around. Here, I want you to have them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just so happens I had an extra set of blueprints lying around. Here, I want you to have them.

Entries.DialogueText: Learned how to craft a 'Furnace'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Learned how to craft a 'Furnace'

Entries.DialogueText: The furnace allows you to smelt metal bars. The bars can be used for crafting, construction, and tool upgrades.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The furnace allows you to smelt metal bars. The bars can be used for crafting, construction, and tool upgrades.

Entries.DialogueText: When you've smelted a few copper bars, consider having me upgrade one of your tools. It can make your work a lot easier.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When you've smelted a few copper bars, consider having me upgrade one of your tools. It can make your work a lot easier.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, okay. I'm heading home. Take it easy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, okay. I'm heading home. Take it easy.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm sorry! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm sorry!

Entries.DialogueText: It's hard to remember my lines when her face is right in front of me like that... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's hard to remember my lines when her face is right in front of me like that...

Entries.DialogueText: No! It's not like that... This is just something I have to do. It's very important to me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No! It's not like that... This is just something I have to do. It's very important to me.

Entries.DialogueText: I've just got to try new 'Joja Bluu' cola. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've just got to try new 'Joja Bluu' cola.

Entries.DialogueText: It's got three times the sorbitol for a thick, sweet blast. And it's cheaper than water! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's got three s the sorbitol for a thick, sweet blast. And it's cheaper than water!

Entries.DialogueText: Have no fear, my dear. The world-class science team at Joja Headquarters have determined that 'Joja Bluu' does not cause a significant erosion of the stomach lining. So you can drink it whenever you like, as much as you like. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have no fear, my dear. The world-class science team at Joja Headquarters have determined that 'Joja Bluu' does not cause a significant erosion of the stomach lining. So you can drink it whenever you like, as much as you like.

Entries.DialogueText: The real question is... 'When will YOU turn bluu?'... *glug* *glug*... Ahh... {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The real question is... 'When will YOU turn bluu?'... *glug* *glug*... Ahh...

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Love}
...You caught me. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...You caught me.

Entries.DialogueText: I was planning to ask Emily on a date. I was at her doorstep and everything... but then I heard her coming and I dove into this bush. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was planning to ask Emily on a date. I was at her doorstep and everything... but then I heard her coming and I dove into this bush.

Entries.DialogueText: Now I'm waiting until she's done talking with Caroline so I can sneak back into my house. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now I'm waiting until she's done talking with Caroline so I can sneak back into my house.

Entries.DialogueText: What did you just say? You'll never upgrade your tools again if I don't ask her out? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What did you just say? You'll never upgrade your tools again if I don't ask her out?

Entries.DialogueText: You're a villain, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're a villain, .

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh* ...alright, I'll do it. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh* ...alright, I'll do it.

Entries.DialogueText: I gotta remember that advice {Farmer_Name} gave me in the saloon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I gotta remember that advice gave me in the saloon.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Emily?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Emily?

Entries.DialogueText: I was wondering if you'd go w... with... tomorrow, me... *gulp* {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was wondering if you'd go w... with... tomorrow, me... *gulp*

Entries.DialogueText: I've got two tickets for the Grampleton Carnival tomorrow. W... Would you go with me? {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got two tickets for the Grampleton Carnival tomorrow. W... Would you go with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Really? Okay! I'll pick you up at five. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Really? Okay! I'll pick you up at five.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you see that?! I've got a date tomorrow night! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you see that?! I've got a date tomorrow night!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh man...I'm so nervous. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh man...I'm so nervous.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for forcing me to do that, earlier. I'm scared, but also very pleased. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for forcing me to do that, earlier. I'm scared, but also very pleased.

Entries.DialogueText: It's an old family recipe. I baked it right in the smelting oven.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's an old family recipe. I baked it right in the smelting oven.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, um... I may have burnt the bottom a little, so... uh... you might have to peel off a layer of charred matter. But the rest is totally edible.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, um... I may have burnt the bottom a little, so... uh... you might have to peel off a layer of charred matter. But the rest is totally edible.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh no...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh no...

Entries.DialogueText: M...Me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: M...Me?

Entries.DialogueText: *gulp*... Okay, Emily. I'll do it. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gulp*... Okay, Emily. I'll do it.

Entries.DialogueText: Aww? Cute? ...*sigh*... {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aww? Cute? ...*sigh*...

Entries.DialogueText: I couldn't do it! I don't wanna break out of my shell! {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I couldn't do it! I don't wanna break out of my shell!

Entries.DialogueText: ...Oh. I... I guess I'm interrupting something here, aren't I? {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Oh. I... I guess I'm interrupting something here, aren't I?

Entries.DialogueText: I understand. I'll leave now... Congrats, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I understand. I'll leave now... Congrats, .

Entries.DialogueText: Hello, {Farmer_Name}... care to join me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello, ... care to join me?

Entries.DialogueText: Let me just go ahead and tell you what's on my mind. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let me just go ahead and tell you what's on my mind.

Entries.DialogueText: I have terrible luck with women, {Farmer_Name}...*sigh* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have terrible luck with women, ...*sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: I'm a nice guy if you get to know me, I swear! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm a nice guy if you get to know me, I swear!

Entries.DialogueText: The girls all seem to like you, {Farmer_Name}...
Entries.DisplayPattern: The girls all seem to like you, ...

Entries.DialogueText: You're a girl, {Farmer_Name}...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're a girl, ...

Entries.DialogueText: Got any tips?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Got any tips?

Entries.DialogueText: What advice can you give me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What advice can you give me?

Entries.DialogueText: Impress women with your strength and charm
Entries.DisplayPattern: Impress women with your strength and charm

Entries.DialogueText: Act crazy, to keep people guessing
Entries.DisplayPattern: Act crazy, to keep people guessing

Entries.DialogueText: Just act natural... be yourself
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just act natural... be yourself

Entries.DialogueText: Treat women the same as men
Entries.DisplayPattern: Treat women the same as men

Entries.DialogueText: Yes!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes!

Entries.DialogueText: Er.. I mean, I'll have the Big n' Cheesy. With extra sauce, please. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er.. I mean, I'll have the Big n' Cheesy. With extra sauce, please.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Unique}
Er... *ahem* Th...Thanks, Emily. For... taking my order.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er... *ahem* Th...Thanks, Emily. For... taking my order.

Entries.DialogueText: Um, Emily? I was...*gulp*... I was wondering... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um, Emily? I was...*gulp*... I was wondering...

Entries.DialogueText: ... never mind. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... never mind.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: I'm doomed... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm doomed...

Entries.DialogueText: 我有时会抱怨我的工作，但我还是为我的工作感到自豪。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我有时会抱怨我的工作,但我还是为我的工作感到自豪。

Entries.DialogueText: 这是一些我最好的作品。希望你喜欢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这是一些我最好的作品。希望你喜欢。

Entries.DialogueText: 看到别人对我的成果感兴趣，真是令人振奋，让我感觉我在做有益的事情。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 看到别人对我的成果感兴趣,真是令人振奋,让我感觉我在做有益的事情。

Entries.DialogueText: 有几件是我上周才完成的。来仔细看看吧，我就站在这后面！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有几件是我上周才完成的。来仔细看看吧,我就站在这后面!

Entries.DialogueText: 如果用我的铱制锤肯定能马上搞定它们。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果用我的铱制锤肯定能马上搞定它们。

Entries.DialogueText: 我已经通过迷宫了……该喝点南瓜啤酒放松一下了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我已经通过迷宫了......该喝点南瓜啤酒放松一下了!

Entries.DialogueText: ……我在尽可能无视我身后的蜘蛛群。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ......我在尽可能无视我身后的蜘蛛群。

Entries.DialogueText: 还有更多食物不？ {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 还有更多食物不?

Entries.DialogueText: 嘶……哦不……今年怎么这么多沙拉…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘶......哦不......今年怎么这么多沙拉......

Entries.DialogueText: 不知道艾米丽是否愿意跟我跳舞呢？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不知道艾米丽是否愿意跟我跳舞呢?

Entries.DialogueText: 唉，大家都有舞伴了……我又是一个人…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 唉,大家都有舞伴了......我又是一个人......

Entries.DialogueText: 好吧，我大概只好吃酸甜果冻来消愁了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 好吧,我大概只好吃酸甜果冻来消愁了。

Entries.DialogueText: 吃得好饱，不过除了吃吃吃也没别的事可以做了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 吃得好饱,不过除了吃吃吃也没别的事可以做了。

Entries.DialogueText: （咀嚼）这个节日的美食是最好吃的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: (咀嚼)这个节日的美食是最好吃的。

Entries.DialogueText: 我今晚穿上了最美丽的鞋子……但却没人欣赏。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我今晚穿上了最美丽的鞋子......但却没人欣赏。

Entries.DialogueText: 我离海浪太近了，脚被弄湿了…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我离海浪太近了,脚被弄湿了......

Entries.DialogueText: *唉* ……羡煞旁人的家庭团聚。而我还是单身一人，好气哦。
Entries.DisplayPattern: *唉* ......羡煞旁人的家庭团聚。而我还是单身一人,好气哦。

Entries.DialogueText: 我该换新的打铁工具了，旧的用了这么多年有点生锈了。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我该换新的打铁工具了,旧的用了这么多年有点生锈了。

Entries.DialogueText: 艾米丽突然变得那么热心地帮助我……难道是意味着？*吞口水*…… {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 艾米丽突然变得那么热心地帮助我......难道是意味着?*吞口水*......

Entries.DialogueText: 这几块雪就是捏不成雪球…… {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这几块雪就是捏不成雪球......

Entries.DialogueText: 我可能还是更擅长在炎热的环境干活。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我可能还是更擅长在炎热的环境干活。

Entries.DialogueText: 没错！我一直在找的就是这个！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 没错!我一直在找的就是这个!

Entries.DialogueText: 有趣的礼物。谢谢！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有趣的礼物。谢谢!

Entries.DialogueText: 这让我很失望。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这让我很失望。

Entries.DialogueText: 谢谢你啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 谢谢你啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿。你的工具准备好了，但你的物品栏满了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿。你的工具准备好了,但你的物品栏满了。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗯，我还在做你的{0}。今天是做不好了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗯,我还在做你的{0}。今天是做不好了。

Entries.DialogueText: ……我发现你在矿山不省人事。我以为我当时要累死了，一路上把你拖到这儿来！
Entries.DisplayPattern: ......我发现你在矿山不省人事。我以为我当时要累死了,一路上把你拖到这儿来!

Entries.DialogueText: 下次小心一点，好吗？ {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 下次小心一点,好吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 这部电影应该是一部爱情片，对吧？唉…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这部电影应该是一部爱情片,对吧?唉......

Entries.DialogueText: 她为什么喜欢那个家伙？要我说这完全不现实…… {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 她为什么喜欢那个家伙?要我说这完全不现实......

Entries.DialogueText: 克林特皱着眉头。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 克林特皱着眉头。

Entries.DialogueText: 那部电影很令人沮丧…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 那部电影很令人沮丧......

Entries.DialogueText: 我猜是“男生之夜”吧？是不是说我必须自己买零食？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我猜是“男生之夜”吧?是不是说我必须自己买零食?

Entries.DialogueText: 哦……那么，我们是在约会吗？ {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哦......那么,我们是在约会吗?

Entries.DialogueText: 这只是……嗝……Joja 可乐。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这只是......嗝......Joja 可乐。

Entries.DialogueText: （轻声）……如果你……累了……可以把你的头放在我的……我的肩膀上。嘿……随便你！ {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: (轻声)......如果你......累了......可以把你的头放在我的......我的肩膀上。嘿......随便你!

Entries.DialogueText: 克林特从没有标签的烧瓶中吸了一口。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 克林特从没有标签的烧瓶中吸了一口。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿……挺有意思的……是吧？ {Portrait:Happy}
哎，{Farmer_Name}，说句实话，我不太喜欢节日。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎,,说句实话,我不太喜欢节日。

Entries.DialogueText: 但假如我待在家里，想到其他人都在外面玩得很开心，我会感觉更糟。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 但假如我待在家里,想到其他人都在外面玩得很开心,我会感觉更糟。

Entries.DialogueText: 需要矿石吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 需要矿石吗?
